control.visible: Skin.Hassetting(listcdart) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart)) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(poster)) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + !SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + Skin.HasSetting(fakehanddisccolor)

Skin.Hassetting(listcdart) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart)) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + !SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://movies/sets) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo)) + Skin.Hassetting(Fakehandtop)
control.label: $INFO[ListItem.Label]
